type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.maven.GroovyMavenDeployer
type.description:
Adds Groovy configuration convenience methods on top of the MavenDeployer. This class provides also a builder for repository and snapshot-repository: 
 mavenUploader.repository(url: 'file://repoDir') {
    authentication(userName: 'myName')
    releases(updatePolicy: 'never')
    snapshots(updatePolicy: 'always')
 }
This call set the repository object and also returns an instance of this object. If you use 'snapshotRepository' instead of repository, the snapshot repository is build. (see MavenDeployer)
